org.cpsolver.studentsct.filter

Class CombinedStudentFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.studentsct.filter.CombinedStudentFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StudentFilter

    public class CombinedStudentFilter
extends Object
implements StudentFilter
    This student filter combines two given student filters with logical operation AND or OR.
    Version:
    StudentSct 1.3 (Student Sectioning)
    Copyright (C) 2007 - 2014 Tomáš Müller
    muller@unitime.org

    Author:
    Tomáš Müller
